p: In Malaysia, humans contracted the disease through NiV-infected pigs, the intermediate hosts of the virus [ 26]. Spillover of the virus from bats to pigs are due to the consumption of fruits partially eaten or contaminated by bats infected with NiV [ 27]. Transmission of the virus from pig to human occurred through direct contact with the infected pigs, and human-to-human infection could be through direct contact, aerosols or fomites.
